cfmongodb.core
Class SearchBuilder

WEB-INF.cftags.component
        cfmongodb.core.SearchBuilder

public class SearchBuilder

extends WEB-INF.cftags.component

Creates a Domain Specific Language (DSL) for querying MongoDB collections.
